title: User Comment
description: A comment from a user related to an article or another comment.

assocId.description: The id of the publication the comment is related to.

assocType.description: The assoc object. This should always be `ASSOC_TYPE_PUBLICATION`.

dateCreated.description: The date that this comment was posted.

userId.description: The id of the user who posted the comment.

userName.description: The name of the user who posted the comment.

userOrcid.description: ORCID of the user who posted the comment.

userAffiliation.description: ORCID of the user who posted the comment.

foreignCommentId.description: (Optional) id of the comment this comment replies to.

dateFlagged.description: The date this comment has been flagged.

flaggedBy.description: The id of the user who flagged the comment.

flagNote.description: The text of the flag note.

submissionId.description: Id of the submission this comment refers to.

publicationId.description: Id of the publication this comment refers to.

contextId.description: Id of the context this comment belongs to.

publicationDOI.description: DOI of the publication this comment refers to.
